message: Let's start with a fair split. You get 10%, I get 90%.  Let's see what you think!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take this offer before inflation eats away at the value!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than 30%. Let's split it 60/40. This is my final offer before the value drops even more!
